meanings.definition: A characteristic or distinguishing feature of an individual's immune system.
meanings.sent1: The idiotypes of our immune system help us fight off infections.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study idiotypes to understand how our bodies protect us from diseases.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if my idiotypes like to have parties and invite other immune cells over.
meanings.sent4: The idiotypes act like little flags, waving to the immune system to recognize invaders.
meanings.sent5: Learning about idiotypes is like discovering the secret codes of our immune defenses.

meanings.definition: The specific antigenic determinants on the variable region of an antibody.
meanings.sent1: Doctors use idiotypes to identify different types of antibodies in the body.
meanings.sent2: The idiotypes on antibodies help our immune system recognize harmful substances.
meanings.sent3: Imagine if the idiotypes on antibodies could talk and tell us about the germs they've seen.
meanings.sent4: The idiotypes on antibodies are like unique fingerprints that help in fighting infections.
meanings.sent5: Studying idiotypes on antibodies is like deciphering a secret language of protection.
